channel.title: Npc [pi] drops
channel.description:
Hey guys, I'm working with the Hybrid PvP v3 source. I managed to fix all of the drops but the Corporeal Beast and Tormented Demons won't get drops. I've managed to get them attackable and they seem to be just fine, also the Tormented Demons have a Constant drop. Anyways I'll show how its at me now and if anyone has a idea please let me know :). [code=java5]#Tormented Demon 8362:25 892:1 1371:1 1373:1 1113:1 1319:1 14484:1 1373:1 1373:1[/code]
[code=java]// NpcID NpcName combat health npc = 8362 Tormented_Demons 450 326[/code]
Need more information? Just msg below.

item.title: Npc [pi] drops
item.dc:creator: @UniqueTrys UniqueTrys
item.description:
@UniqueTrys wrote:

I have all that, the problem is harder to fix than just the basics.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc [pi] drops
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

constant drops are handler in npcconstants
npcid itemid

to fix drop rates use the two npcdrops in the config folder

Line 1 Casual Drops: 8362:25 892:1 1371:1 1373:1 1319:1 14484:1 1373:1 1373:1
line 2 Rare Drops

Make sure its the right npcid

Read full topic
